card.name: Piter de Vries, Master of Assassins

property.name: Operation
property.value: Intrigue Tactic (engagement). Capture a target persona vanquished during an intrigue in which Piter is a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Initiative Tactic (declaration). Engage to reduce a target rival's declared favor by X. X may not exceed Mohiam's weirding rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Jessica may counter during any rite except battle. If you govern Leto or Paul Atreides, Jessica adopts Atreides allegiance and gains +2 resistance.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to assign X deferment tokens to a target subdued Dune event. X equals Ramallo's prescience rank. If you govern Dune or the Forbidden Zone, Sister Ramallo gains Fremen allegiance and +1 prescience rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: When leading a battle rite, Korba generates +1 force per additional Fremen participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Discard a target aide vanquished during an intrigue rite in which Liscia is a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Increase or decrease the CROE by 1 for the duration of the Exchange operation. The CROE must still be reset after each spice transfer.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to your leader. The leader generates a +3 force if a rival participant is assigned a deployment shield.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target charter. The assigned charter may not be declared the target of an arbitration.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target Heir. Target gains +1 command and +1 arbitration ranks. Target is immune to discard effects.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target Reverend Mother. Engage target to reduce a rival's favor by X. X equals the target's prescience rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona. Target gains +1 resistance.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona. If target becomes subdued, do not subdue Spice Addiction. When subdued, target may not be assigned more than 1 deferment token.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to discard a target sickness enhancement.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to transfer up to 3 spice assigned to a target desert you govern to your hoard.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 4 solaris in your treasury. If you govern Dune, produce 1 additional solari.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 1 spice assigned to the Imperial Basin. Or, engage to produce 1 spice in the Guild hoard. If produced in the Guild hoard, reset the CROE.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 1 spice assigned to the Minor Erg. Or, engage to produce 1 spice in the Guild hoard. If produced in the Guild hoard, reset the CROE.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 1 spice assigned to the open Bled. Or, engage to produce 1 spice in the Guild hoard. If produced in the Guild hoard, reset the CROE.

property.name: Operation
property.value: When a rival transfers spice during an exchange operation, produce 1 solari in your house treasury per spice transferred.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce X solaris in your treasury. X equals the total number of deserts, Spice Harvesters, and Carryalls governed by your rivals.

property.name: AutoScript
property.value: CE:Gain1Solaris-perDesert_or_{Spice Harvester, Spice Mining Factory}_or_{Carryall, Harvester Transport}-byRival

property.name: Operation
property.value: When spice tokens are produced by a desert holding or Spice Blow event, produce 1 solari per spice in your treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce X solaris in your treasury. X equals the current CROE.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 3 solaris in your treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to generate X spice in the Guild hoard. X equals the Navigator's prescience rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Swordmaster may Counter during dueling rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: House Agent may Counter during intrigue rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Distribute X "Sandworm" force among one or more target spice tokens, Spice Harvesters, and non-Fremen personnel assigned to a target desert. Spice tokens each have a resistance of 1. Discard all targets vanquished by Sandworm force.

property.name: Operation
property.value: The current governor of Dune must pay X solaris to the imperial treasury or else subdue Dune. X equals the CROE.

property.name: Operation
property.value: The current governor of Dune may transfer X spice from the Guild hoard to their own. X equals (6-CROE). Reset the CROE after transfering all spice.

property.name: Operation
property.value: The current governor of Dune must pay 1 spice per desert they govern to the Guild hoard. If the governor cannot pay the full ammount, they must reduce their favor by an ammount equal to the CROE.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Each house must discard one card from its assembly.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. No house may request admission to the High Council.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Draw up to X cards from the top of your house discard and reshuffle them into your house deck. X equals the assigned persona's command rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Discard 1 spice from a target rival's hoard.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Initiate a petition to deploy a target holding in a rival's assembly as the petitioner. If declared the victor, deply the target in your domain. Otherwise, turn the card face-down in its current location.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Capture a target subdued fief, except a homeworld or Dune.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Reduce your favor by X to discard any target subdued fief, except a homeworld or Dune. X equals the target's deployment cost.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Prescience Effect. Capture a target subdued event.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Target rival may not sell spice during their CHOAM Exchange operation.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to your homeworld. Once rankings have been assigned, discard Hidden Reserves to draw a target card from your house discard. The target must be a card you discarded during the initiative phase.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. ASsign to a target rival's homeworld. Target must pass during its next option phase.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to the petition target. If you are the victor of the petition, you may pay X additional solaris to discard the target. X equals the target's deployment cost.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to the petition target. The victor must pay the final deployment cost to you instead of the imperial treasury. Once deplyed, no other house may deploy Petitioning Tithe.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to your leader. The leader generates +1 force per additional participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to a target non-fief participant. Discard the target if vanquished.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to your leader. The leader generates +1 force per additional participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to a target non-fief participant governed by your rival. Capture the target if vanquished.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. (Poison). Assign to a target participant. Discard the target if vanquished.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to a target participant. Discard the target if vanquished.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to a target participant governed by your rival. Capture the target if vanquished.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona. Intrigue Tactic (engagement). If target participates in an intrigue rite, engage to include as a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or charter. Arbitration Tactic (engagement). If target participates in an arbitration rite, engage to include as a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or fief. Battle Tactic (engagement). If target participates in a battle rite, engage to include as a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target subdued persona. The target may not be assigned deferment tokens while Shigawire is assigned.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. Target generates +3 force during an intrigue.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target Reverend Mother. When target participates in intrigue rites, discard a target persona vanquished during the intrigue.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona or troop not currently assigned a projectile. Target generates +2 force during battle rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona or troop not currently assigned a projectile. Target generates +3 force during a battle.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target desert. Engage and play 1 solari to transfer 1 spice from assigned target in your Hoard.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to your homeworld. When deploying a target ally from your assembly, engage to place the target in the disengaged position.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target Dune fief you govern. Engage to transfer Ornithopter and up to 3 personnel assigned to the same fief to a target Dune fief you govern. Personnel retain their current status when transferred.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. Target gains Reverend Mother subtype, +1 weirding rank, and +1 prescience rank. Target is immune to poison effects.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. Target is immune to Prescience effects. Declaration Tactic. Engage target to discard a target Prescience venture or tactic.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona. If target becomes subdued, do not subdue Timed Drug. When subdued, target may not be deployed until it has been assigned a number of deferment tokens equal to its deplyment cost.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona you govern, assigning X Breath tokens to Tooth. Poison Effect. Discard the assigned persona to apply 1 force per assigned token to a target persona. If target is vanquished, discard the target.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Poison Effect. Assign to a target persona. X equals the target's resistance. If the target is transferred from its current domain, discard the target.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 3 solaris in your treasury. IF you govern Dune, produce 2 additional solaris.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 5 solaris in your treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 5 solaris in your treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 5 solaris in your treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 4 solaris in your treasury. Or engage to increase your favor by 3.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 4 solaris in your treasury. Tupile may not be declared the target of a battle.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 3 solaris in your treasury. When deploying Dune, do not subdue Forbidden Zone.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 3 solaris in your treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 3 solaris in your treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to deploy a battalion at no cost. A subdued target need not be assigned deferment tokens prior to development.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Each time a holding is deployed by a rival, produce 2 solaris in your treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: When a rival buys favor, produce 1 solari in your treasury for each point of favor purchased.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Each time a desert is engaged, produce 2 solaris in your treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce X solaris in your treasury. X equals the total number of Dune fiefs deplyed by your rivals.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 4 solaris in your treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 4 solaris in your treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Each time a mentat is deployed by a rival, produce 3 solaris in your treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Each time a rival deploys an equipment resource, produce 1 solari in your treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: engage to produce 1 spice in your hoard.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce X solaris in your treasury. X equals the number of personnel assigned to a target Dune fief.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Initiative (declaration). Engage to add +X to your declared favor. X equals Leto's command rank.

card.name: Paul Atreides, Son of Duke Leto

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to examine a target subdued event.

property.name: Operation
property.value: When participating in an intrigue rite, Thufir gains +1 resistance.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duncan may Counter during any dueling rite targeting an Atreides persona.

property.name: Operation
property.value: When participating in a duel or battle in which there are Harkonnen participants, Gurney generates +2 force and gains +1 resistance.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Initiative tactic (declaration). Engage and play X solaris to increase or decrease your declared favor by X. X may not exceed the Baron's command rank.

card.name: Feyd Rautha, Nephew of the Baron

property.name: Operation
property.value: Feyd gains Surprise when participating in dueling rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Rabban may Direct when leading battle rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engagement Tactic. Engage to add +2 to the resistance of a target participant you govern during a battle or intrigue rite.

property.name: Operation
property.value: During petitions targeting holdings, you may increase the bid as if you had an additional 5 solaris in your treasury. If you are the victor and cannot play the full deployment cost, you may subdue Shaddam IV instead of losing favor.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Fenring may counter during duels targeting Corrino personas. When countering, Fenring gains +1 resistance.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Aramsham gains Surprise when leading battle rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: If you govern Dune, Kynes adopts Fremen allegiance, gaining +2 command and +1 battle rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Jareh may Direct when leading a battle rite targeting a desert. If target desert is vanquished, transfer any assigned spice to your hoard.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Irulan gains Surprise during arbitration rites. If you govern Shaddam IV, Irulan gains Corrino allegiance, +1 command and +1 arbitration.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Capture a target noble vanquished during an intrigue in which Lady Margot is a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Stilgar gains Surprise when leading battle rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Chani may Counter during duels targeting Fremen personas. When countering, Chani gains +1 resistance.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Ignore all effects generated by Counter tactics/operations when Jamis leads a dueling rite.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Mapes may counter during intrigue rites. Intrigue Tactic (declaration). Engage to discard a target intrigue venture.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to assign X deferment tokens to a target subdued Imperium event. X equals Oberon's prescience rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to examine uo to X subdued events governed by a target rival. X equals Mucca's prescience rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Saeth may Counter during arbitration and intrigue rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Tactic (declaration): Engage to reduce the deployment cost of any persona by 2 solaris. If engaged during a petition, reduce the final deployment cost.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to discard X deferment tokens from a target subdued persona. X equals the Slavemaster's Intrigue rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Leven Breche may Direct when leading during Battle rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to engage a target persona.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Naib may Direct when leading Battle rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to assign X deferment tokens to a target subdued persona you govern. X equals the Physician's Intrigue rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: House Assassin gains Surprise when leading Intrigue rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: CHOAM Delegate may Counter during Arbitration rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Dune smuggler gains Surprise when participating in a Battle in which a desert is also a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Guard Commander may Counter during battle rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Distribute X "Storm" tokens among one or more target bastion, transport or personnel resources assigned to a target desert. Subdue all targets whose Resistance is reduced to 0 by Storm force.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Produce X spie tokens and assign them to a target desert. X may not exceed 3.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Transfer up to X spice tokens assigned to a target desert to the Guild Hoard.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Distribute X "Riot" force among one or more target bastion, transport or personnel resources assigned to a target city. Subdue all resources vanquished by Riot force.

property.name: Operation
property.value: The current governor of Dune may immediately increase his or her favor by X. X equals (6-CROE).

property.name: Operation
property.value: The current governor of Dune must immediately decrease their favor by X. X equals (CROE-1).

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. No house may buy spice. X equals (6-CROE).

property.name: Operation
property.value: Each player may produce 1 solari per charter they govern in their treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Discard X spice from the Guild Hoard, or produce X Spice in the Guild Hoard. X may be no greater than 5. Reset the CROE after discarding or producing the Spice.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. No house may sell spice. X equals the CROE.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. No house may petition to deploy a holding.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Each house must pay X solaris to the Imperial treasury. X equals the CROE. If a house cannot pay the full amount, it must reduce its favor by 1 per unpaid solari.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. No house may buy favor.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Double the deployment cost of all troops, blades, projectiles, and aides possessing the Battle talent.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect: No house may initiate an arbitration rite.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Each house must pay 1 solari per holding they govern to the Imperial treasury. If a house cannot pay the full amount, it must reduce its favor by 1 per unpaid solari.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. No house may petition to deploy an ally.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. No house may engage a fief to produce solaris.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Each house may pay X solaris to the imperial treasury to immediately increase their favor by X. X may not exceed 5.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Each house may remove one card from their imperial discard and place it in their Imperial deck. All players must then shuffle their Imperial decks.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. No house may initiate a Battle rite.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. No house may initiate an Intrigue rite.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. No house may initiate a Dueling rite.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Each house must discard X cards from its hand. X may not exceed 3.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Reduce the deployment cost of all allies and personnel you deploy from your hand by 1 solaris each.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. If you govern Dune, reduce the deployment cost of all troops by 1 solari each.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Discard 1 favor to disengage a target holding you govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Conduct an additional CHOAM Exchange operation.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Initiate a petition to deploy a card in your assembly regardless of whether you've lost a petition during the current interval.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Transfer a target ally from your assembly to your domain and assign 1 deferment token to it.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Transfer a target holding from your assembly to your domain and assign 1 deferment token to it.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Transfer a target subdued ally to it's governor's assembly.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Transfer a target subdued non-homeworld holding to its governor's assembly.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Initiate a battle rite. The assigned persona must lead the rite. The venture does not count against your house interval limit.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Apply X force to a target fief. If applied force equals or exceeds the target's resistance, subdue the target. X equals the assigned persona's battle rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Discard up to X spice assigned to target desert, X equals assigned persona's battle rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Initiate a dueling rite. The assigned persona must lead the rite. This venture does not count against your house interval limit.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Apply X force to a target ally. If applied force equals or exceeds the target's resistance, subdue the target. X equals the assigned persona's dueling rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Reduce a rival's favor by X. X equals the assigned persona's dueling talent.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Initiate an arbitration rite. The assigned persona must lead the rite. This venture does not count against your house interval limit.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Reduce a target's rival's favor by X. X equals the assigned persona's arbitration rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Apply X force to a target charter. If applied force equals or exceeds the target's resistance, subdue the target. X equals the assigned persona's arbitration rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Target rival must discard X solaris from their treasury. X equals the intrigue rank of the assigned persona.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Apply X force to a target aide. If applied force equals or exceeds the target's resistance, subdue the target. X equals the assigned persona's intrigue rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Poison Effect. Discard a target subdued persona.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Prescience Effect. Examine up to X target cards in a rival's assembly or hand. X equals the assigned persona's prescience rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Prescience Effect. Examine up to X target subdued events governed by a rival. X equals the assigned persona's prescience rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Prescience Effect. Assign or discard up to X deferment tokens to or from a target subdued event. X equals the assigned persona's prescience rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Prescience Effect. Search through your Imperial or House deck and draw a target card into your assembly or hand. Reshuffle the deck after drawing the target.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Initiate a Rite. The assigned persona gains a +X bonus to the Force where X is the target's Weirding Rank. The Persona using this card need not possess the required talent for the Rite.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Initiate a Rite. The assigned persona gains a +X bonus to the Resistance where X is the target's Weirding Rank. The Persona using this card need not possess the required talent for the Rite.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Transfer a target skill or title enhancement from a target Sisterhood persona to the assigned persona.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect (Voice). Capture target persona whose weirding rank is lower than the assigned persona's. Replace target when Voice Command is discarded. Target retains its status when replaced.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Reduce the favor of a target by 3.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Subdue a target card generating a Poison effect.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Disengage a target persona you govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to a target rival's homeworld. All aides and personnel deployed by the target must be placed in the engaged position. Discard Fold-Space Complications at the end of the current interval.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to a target rival's homeworld. All equipment deployed by target must be placed in the engaged position. Discard Supply Tampering at the end of the current interval.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Deploy a venture from your hand as it if were your house interval. You must immediately attempt to initiate and resolve the venture. Duration effect ventures must be discarded at the end of the current house interval.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Discard X deferment tokens assigned to one or more target non-event cards. X may not exceed 5.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Target rival may not buy spice during their CHOAM Exchange operation.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Discard a target card from your hand to increase your declared favor by an ammount equal to the target's deployment cost. Targets having an X deployment cost increase the declared favor by 5.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Discard a target card from your hand to decrease a rival's declared favor by an amount equal to the target's deployment cost. Targets having an X deployment cost decrease the declared favor by 5.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage an ally you govern to increase your declared favor by an amount equal to the ally's command rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage an ally you govern to decrease the declared favor of a target house by an amount equal to the ally's command rank.

property.value: Assign to a target or fief. Battle Tactic (engagement): If target participates in a battle rite, engage to include as a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a persona or fief. Battle Tactic (engagement): If target participates in a battle rite, engage to include as a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or fief. Battle Tactic (engagement): If target participates in a battle rite, engage to include as a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or fief. Battle Tactic (engagement)): If target participates in a battle rite, engage to include as a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target Persona. Engage target and discard Sabotage Device to subdue a target transport governed by a rival.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona. Engage target and discard Thumper to remove a Sandworm event from your house discard and place it in your hand.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. Target is immune to Surprise effects generated during battle and intrigue rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. Target is immune to all Poison effects.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target Spice Harvester. Declaration Tactic: Discard Seismic Probes to make the assigned Harvester immune to force applied by a target deployed Sandworm event.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. Engage target to disengage a target persona or personnel card you govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. Target gains +3 resistance during Dueling rites and +1 resistance during Intrigue and Battle rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target noble you govern. Increase your assembly by 1.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona not currently assigned a blade. Target generates +1 force and gains +1 resistance during Dueling rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona not currently assigned a blade. Target generates +1 force during a duel.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. Target may be assigned an additional blade. Target generates +1 force during dueling rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. Target generates +2 force during Intrigue rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona or troop not currently assigned a projectile. Target generates +1 force during battle rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target Spice Harvester. Declaration Tactic: Engage to transfer the Harvester and Carryall to a target Dune fief you govern. The Harvester maintains its current status when transferred.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona. Engage to transfer a target ally from your assembly to your domain, placing it in the subdued position.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target city. Target generates +1 force and gains +2 resistance during battles.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target desert. Target gains +1 command and +2 resistance.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to target charter. Target gains +1 command and +2 resistance.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target charter. Arbitration Tactic (enhancement): If target participates in an arbitration rite, engage a target noble to participate in the arbitration.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target homeworld or Siridar fief except Forbidden Zone. Target gains +2 command, +2 battle rank, and +2 resistance. Target gains City subtype.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to the Forbidden Zone or to a target desert. Target gains +2 command, +1 battle rank, and +3 resistance. Target gains City subtype.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target fief. Target generates +2 force and gains +2 resistance during battles.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to target fief. Target gains +1 command. Engage to transfer up to 3 personnel assigned to a target persona you govern to one or more eligible targets. Personnel retain their current status when transferred.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target city. The assigned target may not be declared the target of a battle.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 3. ASsign to a target Dune fief. Reduce the deployment cost of all subdued personnel assigned to the target by 1 solari each.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to target persona. Target gains +1 dueling rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to target persona. Target gains +1 arbitration rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target mentat. Declaration Tactic: Engage target to examine up to 3 cards in a rival's assembly.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona. Target gains +1 prescience rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona. If target is assigned a deployed Shield, it gains +X resistance during dueling rites. X equals the target's dueling rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona. Target gains +1 intrigue rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona. Target gains +1 battle rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. Target generates +X force or gains +X resistance during dueling rites. X equals the target's weirding rank. Declare 'force' or 'resistance' when engaging target as a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona. Target gains +1 weirding rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target noble. Target gets +1 command. Target may Direct when leading arbitration rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target Navigator. Target gains +1 command and +1 prescience. Target may not be declared the target of dueling or intrigue rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target mentat. Target gains +1 command. Target may Direct when leading intrigue rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. If assigned persona is the target of a duel, you may engage an eligible Fremen persona to Counter.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. Target gains +1 command. Target may Direct when leading battle rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target vassal or aide. Target gains the subtype Noble and +1 command.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. Target gains +1 command. Target gains Surprise when leading dueling rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target Dune fief. Double the deployment cost of all subdued non-Fremen personnel assigned to the target.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target physician. Target gains Suk subtype and is immune to Capture effects. Engage to discard a target Sickness enhancement assigned to a card you govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target mentat. Target generates +1 force and gains +1 resistance during intrigue and arbitration rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. Target gains an additional allegiance of your choice. You must declare the allegiance when assigning Secret Allegiance.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Capture a target subdued charter, except Dune.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Initiate an intrigue rite. The assigned persona must lead the rite. This venture does not count against your house interval limit.
